post.text:
The U.S. presidency isn't an entry-level job.

How Hillary's time as our secretary of state shows she's ready:

comment.author: Momen
comment.text: Hillary has been in the trenches working hard for Women's rights, Children's rights, Minority rights, all Human rights. What has Trump done except swindled people and banks out of money,etc. It is a very long list of terrible things Trump has done to people including 2 of his wives and other women. He has been a user and abuser all his life. No reason to change now. The wall will never be built, just like all the other lies he has told his supporters

replies.author: Seth
replies.text: The wall will be built, and Mexico will pay for it. Trump 2016!

replies.author: Dusty
replies.text: Trump's tax returns would likely show his connections to and dependence on Russian capital aligned with Putin. Show us your Tax returns Trump. What are you hiding? #dopydonald #donthecon #nevertrump #weakdonald

replies.author: Skyelar
replies.text: Lol your joking right? Minority's want jobs not handouts

replies.author: Danielle
replies.text: Seth Do you really believe a wall will be built? Do you really believe Mexico will pay for it? It is a fantasy and an evil one at that!
